00004 function    FirstToSecond( FirstPanel , SecondPanel , EntityName )
00005 {
00006       if( EntityName != '' )
00007       {
00008             document.getElementById( FirstPanel ).removeChild( document.getElementById( EntityName + '_hidden_id' ) );
00009             document.getElementById( FirstPanel ).removeChild( document.getElementById( EntityName + '_div_id_first' ) );
00010             document.getElementById( SecondPanel ).innerHTML += "<div onclick=\"javascript:SecondToFirst( '" + FirstPanel + "' , '" + SecondPanel + "' , '" + EntityName + "' );\" class='double_panel_row no_selection_text' id='" + EntityName + "_div_id_second'>" + EntityName + "</div>";
00011             
00012             jQuery( '.no_selection_text' ).disableTextSelect();
00013       }
00014 }

00019 function    SecondToFirst( FirstPanel , SecondPanel , EntityName )
00020 {
00021       if( EntityName != '' )
00022       {
00023             document.getElementById( FirstPanel ).innerHTML += "<input type='hidden' name='entities[]' id='" + EntityName + "_hidden_id' value='" + EntityName + "'>";

00034 function    InitPanels( FirstPanel , SecondPanel , FirstPanelEntities , SecondPanelEntities )
00035 {
00036       if( FirstPanelEntities != '' )
00037       {
00038             FirstPanelEntities = FirstPanelEntities.split( ',' );
00039 
00040             for( i = 0 ; i < FirstPanelEntities.length ; i++ )

00043                   document.getElementById( FirstPanel ).innerHTML += "<input type='hidden' name='entities[]' id='" + FirstPanelEntities[ i ] + "_hidden_id' value='" + FirstPanelEntities[ i ] + "'>";

00045       }
00046       else
00047       {
